function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Customers' preferences redirected from hypermarkets to decentralized commercial places due to fear of COVID-19, leading to increased crowding in smaller spaces.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of COVID-19 due to crowding in decentralized commercial places.","Mitigation":"Implement crowd management strategies, enforce social distancing measures, and improve ventilation in decentralized commercial places.","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring systems, air quality sensors, and ventilation systems.","People":"Customers, employees, and visitors to decentralized commercial places.","Owner":"Business owners and local government authorities."},{"Description":"Shift in urban design towards decentralized and restructuring of public spaces due to COVID-19 concerns.","Impact":"Inadequate planning and design of public spaces may lead to higher risk of disease transmission and lack of adequate ventilation.","Mitigation":"Incorporate decentralized and restructuring design principles, prioritize ventilation and open spaces, and ensure adequate sanitation facilities.","Technologies":"Urban planning software, air quality monitoring systems, and sanitation technology.","People":"City dwellers, urban planners, and architects.","Owner":"Urban planning authorities and city development organizations."},{"Description":"Positive correlation between meteorological variables, air quality, and COVID-19 cases and deaths.","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 transmission in areas with poor air quality and extreme meteorological conditions.","Mitigation":"Improve air quality through environmental regulations, ventilation systems, and public health policies. Raise awareness of the correlation between meteorological variables and COVID-19 transmission.","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring devices, climate control systems, and health communication technologies.","People":"Residents, workers, and visitors in areas with poor air quality and extreme meteorological conditions.","Owner":"Environmental agencies, public health organizations, and local government authorities."},{"Description":"Lack of workplace regulations and directives to mitigate COVID-19 transmission among workers and visitors.","Impact":"Increased risk of workplace outbreaks, community transmission, and negative economic impact due to lack of protective measures.","Mitigation":"Implement workplace safety guidelines, provide protective equipment, enforce social distancing, and improve ventilation in workplace settings.","Technologies":"Workplace monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and ventilation technology.","People":"Workers, visitors, and employers in workplace settings.","Owner":"Employers, regulatory authorities, and occupational health organizations."}]}
